nodes.bodyText: We do need the renderMetadata for things like the logs in the lumberjack backpack, etc.

Yeah, just saw that and was about to post here. It was auto-populating to 'null' for me for new citizens without any renderMetadata.  If you point me to where it is populated, I can try to make sure it gets defaulted to '' or something.
setRenderMetadata is called by the AI
turns out it doesn't actually break anything, reverted
